title: Serendipity-Based Educational Design for Digital Archive Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic academic research skills and proficiency in digital archive usage
context.additional_context: Program for science sector managers/leaders to strengthen digital archive navigation competencies

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies that induce serendipity (unintended discoveries) during digital archive exploration
Learners can apply a creative thinking process to connect accidental discoveries during exploration to research questions
Learners can design exploration pathways utilizing personal experiences and expertise when navigating scientific digital archives

resources: Digital Archive Sample Dataset for Science Fields

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
